param.name: google_map_key
param.label: Google Maps key
param.description: Google Maps key. Obtain a key for your website from http://www.google.com/apis/maps/signup.html

param.name: latitude
param.label: Map Center - latitude
param.description: Center of your location map - latitude

param.name: longitude
param.label: Map Center - longitude
param.description: Center of your location map - longitude

param.name: zoom
param.label: Zoom Level
param.description: Zoom Level for your location map

param.name: marker_lat
param.label: Latitude for Marker
param.description: Latitude for the Marker on your location map

param.name: marker_lon
param.label: Longitude for Marker
param.description: Longitude for the Marker on your location map

param.name: map_width
param.label: Width of map (px)
param.description: The width of your location map (in px)

param.name: map_height
param.label: Height of map (px)
param.description: The height of your location map (in px)

param.name: messag
param.label: Text Message for Marker
param.description: Text Message for the Marker on your location map (HTML code is supported)

param.name: map_text
param.label: text for Map
param.description: Latitude for the Marker on your location map
